name: Worst Movies Of All Time Online Quiz | Movies Grab Bag | 10 Questions

questions.text: Neil Simon's 'Out-Of-Towners' (the original) included unending shrillness and whining by
'Murder On The Orient Express' featured a steady stream of inane, comic book characters. The ending, however, was the last straw:
options: No one had actually been killed
questions.explanation:
They all committed the murder.

	Double ugh!

questions.text: A sci-fi entry: 'The Stepford Wives'. Author?
Even good actors get in bombs. Paul Newman was in a futuristic sci fi movie that opened and closed almost immediately. Title?
'Murder by Death' was also a rather dim comedy. Author?
A musical entry: Despite the fact that Angela Lansbury was a big hit as the star of the Broadway show 'Mame', she didn't star in the movie. Who did?
questions.explanation:
Lucille Ball.

	It didn't do well

questions.text: Now, for sports: 'The Babe Ruth Story'. (Not the John Goodman version) Name the star.
questions.explanation:
William Bendix.

	Not to be confused with 'Pride of the Yankees' (Lou Gehrig)

questions.text: Michael Cimino's 'Heaven's Gate' caused financial chaos for the studio that produced it. Who was the star of the movie?
A movie that received an enormous amount of coverage for its record-setting (at the time) high cost.
Another 'memorable' movie was 'Bedtime for Bonzo'. Star? (Not Bonzo)
